SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.observer

Class GameListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.observer.GameListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener<GameEvent>
public class GameListener extends Object implements Listener<GameEvent>
The GameListener class implements the Listener interface for GameEvent. It is responsible for handling game events and updating the client accordingly. The class includes a reference to the client, the server, and the username of the client. It also includes methods for updating the client based on game events and retrieving the client and username.

    • GameListener

      public GameListener(ClientHandlerInterface client, Server server) throws IOException
      Constructs a new GameListener with the specified client and server.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that this listener is associated with.
      server - The server that this listener is associated with.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(GameEvent event, Object... args)
      Updates the client based on the received game event. This method is called when a game event occurs. It updates the client by calling the server's updateClient method. The updateClient method is called with the client, the game event, and the first argument from the args array. If an InterruptedException, NotExistingPlayerException, or IOException occurs during the update, it throws a RuntimeException.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Listener<GameEvent>
      Parameters:
      event - The game event that occurred.
      args - Additional arguments that may be needed for the update.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an InterruptedException, NotExistingPlayerException, or IOException occurs during the update.

    • getClient

      public ClientHandlerInterface getClient()
      Returns the client associated with this GameListener.

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Returns the username of the client associated with this GameListener.
